tool_description: This Ethfinex trustless API is designed to allow access to submit, cancel and query placed orders onto the shared Bitfinex/Ethfinex order book
name: Ethfinex Trustless
title: Ethfinex Trustless

api_list.name: GetVolume
api_list.description: Requests an volume by day, for instance: https://api.ethfinex.com/trustless/v1/r/volume/2019/01/01 will details regarding the volume for 01/01/2019
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://karl_efx-ethfinex-trustless-v1.p.rapidapi.com/r/volume/2019/01/01"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "karl_efx-ethfinex-trustless-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://karl_efx-ethfinex-trustless-v1.p.rapidapi.com/r/volume/2019/01/01"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "karl_efx-ethfinex-trustless-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
